name: automation-audit
description: This is a dataset of Power Automate, Workato, and Zapier integrations

scripts.assemble:connectors: source .venv/bin/activate && csvs-to-sqlite storage/key_value_stores/default/connectors.csv audit.db -f name -f description -f title
scripts.publish: source .venv/bin/activate && datasette publish vercel audit.db --project automation-audit --metadata metadata.json --template-dir=templates --setting facet_time_limit_ms 1000
scripts.test: echo "Error: oops, the actor has no tests yet, sad!" && exit 1

author: It's not you it's me
